nodes.text: Star Wars: Darth Vader Activity Book
Star Wars: Darth Vader Activity Book is an activity book based on the character of Darth Vader. The book was released on June 30, 2016.

Rediscover the full story of the galaxy's most sinister Sith Lord, from his humble beginnings as a slave on Tatooine, to his seat as one of the most feared villains in the universe in this exciting activity book.
Complete activities that span the first six episodes of the phenomenal saga, including tricky puzzles, clever word games and sticker scenes to complete in any way you like.
Joining the dark side has never been more fun.
